_header: When that next approachen gan the fest
_description:
Charles d’Orléans, petition to the Court of Love, a series of balades translated from the French (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 153) — twenty-eight 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with a two-line address after stanza 21 and six concluding lines

BLHar682.First Lines:
WHen that next approchen gan the festOf loue and semblid was his
                    parlement…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Bi the trewe Charlis Duk or OrlyaunceThat sumtyme was oon of
                    your pore servaunce
